author: albertdow
body:
This PR is for adding an initial monitoring strategy for the VBF jets of three new paths:

HLT_VBF_DoubleLooseChargedIsoPFTau20_Trk1_eta2p1_Reg_v*
HLT_VBF_DoubleMediumChargedIsoPFTau20_Trk1_eta2p1_Reg_v*
HLT_VBF_DoubleTightChargedIsoPFTau20_Trk1_eta2p1_Reg_v*

It is based on the framework developed for HLT VBF+MET paths in PR #19294 (backport #19561).
title: Monitoring VBF jets for VBF + 2 Taus HLT paths
